HeroSection.title: Your business — our professionals
HeroSection.description: A platform to quickly find vetted experts, from accountants to developers. We handle the contracts and guarantee results.

features.title: Everything to solve your tasks
features.description: Our platform provides convenient tools to select verified specialists, draft contracts, and control service quality.

fastSelection.title: Fast specialist matching
fastSelection.description: Find professionals for any task—from accounting to development—in just minutes.

transparentContracts.title: Transparent contracts
transparentContracts.description: All deals are processed through our platform with clear terms and guarantees.

vettedPerformers.title: Verified performers
vettedPerformers.description: We work only with qualified specialists who have passed our vetting.

qualityControl.title: Quality control
qualityControl.description: We monitor task execution and ensure a high level of service.

flexibleSolutions.title: Flexible solutions
flexibleSolutions.description: Choose services tailored to your needs: one-time projects or long-term collaboration.

support24.title: 24/7 support
support24.description: Our team is always available to assist you at every step.

WorkingSection.title: Simple process, reliable results
WorkingSection.description: Get started in minutes and let us handle finding the best professionals for your business.

step1.title: Submit a request
step1.description: Select the service you need and fill out a short form. It takes less than a minute.

step2.title: Choose a specialist
step2.description: We will recommend vetted professionals that match your requirements.

step3.title: Receive results
step3.description: Sign a contract with us and we will ensure quality delivery.

TestimonialSection.title: Trusted by our clients
TestimonialSection.description: Find out what our clients say about working with our platform and specialists.
TestimonialSection.testimonial1_quote: The platform helped us find an excellent accountant in a day. We signed the contract quickly, everything was transparent and hassle-free.
TestimonialSection.testimonial2_quote: Thanks to the platform, we hired a developer for our website. The quality of work exceeded expectations, and the support was top-notch.
TestimonialSection.testimonial3_quote: The support team responds instantly, and the specialist matching process is very convenient. Now all our tasks are handled by professionals.
TestimonialSection.testimonial4_quote: We tried working directly with freelancers, but this platform simplified everything: from selection to contract. Highly recommended!
TestimonialSection.testimonial5_quote: The platform allowed us to focus on our business instead of finding specialists. All processes are clear and transparent.
TestimonialSection.testimonial6_quote: We reduced our outsourcing costs by 25% thanks to the quick matching of specialists and transparent working conditions.

FAQSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQSection.description: Find answers to common questions about our platform.
FAQSection.faq1_question: How do I get started with the platform?
FAQSection.faq1_answer: Simply submit a request by selecting the service you need. We'll match you with a specialist and draft the contract within one business day. No prepayment is required.
FAQSection.faq2_answer: Yes, if the specialist does not meet your needs, we'll promptly find another professional who fits your requirements at no additional cost.
FAQSection.faq3_question: How many specialists can I hire?
FAQSection.faq3_answer: You can hire as many specialists as you need for your project. We offer both one-time services and long-term collaborations, with no limits.
FAQSection.faq4_question: Are there discounts for small businesses?
FAQSection.faq4_answer: Yes, we offer special terms for small businesses and startups. Contact our team for more details.
FAQSection.faq5_question: How is the quality of services ensured?
FAQSection.faq5_answer: We work only with vetted professionals who have passed our verification process. We also monitor task execution and provide a guarantee on results.
FAQSection.faq6_answer: We offer 24/7 support via email and phone for all clients. We also have a knowledge base and chat for swift assistance at any stage.

CTASection.heading: Ready to find the best specialists?
CTASection.description: Join hundreds of clients who have already entrusted us with their tasks and received professional solutions.
CTASection.footerText: No prepayment. Transparent contract. Cancel at any time.

Footer.description: Find the best specialists for your business. We provide transparent contracts and quality services.

SpecialistsPage.heading: Our Specialists
SpecialistsPage.description: Meet the professionals ready to tackle your needs—from accounting to development.
SpecialistsPage.specialist1_description: Expert in bookkeeping and tax reporting for small and medium businesses.
SpecialistsPage.specialist2_description: Builds modern web applications using React, Node.js, and other technologies.
SpecialistsPage.specialist3_description: Assists with contract drafting, company registration, and legal support.
SpecialistsPage.specialist4_description: Develops effective marketing campaigns and digital promotion strategies.
SpecialistsPage.specialist5_description: Creates intuitive interfaces and engaging designs for web and mobile apps.
SpecialistsPage.specialist6_description: Optimizes IT processes and helps integrate modern technologies into businesses.

ContactPage.heading: Find a specialist for your request
ContactPage.subheading: Fill out the form — our manager will contact you to clarify the details. Or message us directly.
ContactPage.placeholder_description: Describe who you’re looking for or what task you need done

LegalServicesPage.heading: Legal Services
LegalServicesPage.description: A full range of legal services for individuals and businesses.
LegalServicesPage.service1_title: Registration of LLC/Private and Family Enterprise
LegalServicesPage.service2_title: Registration of LLC with foreign citizens participation
LegalServicesPage.service3_title: Registration of IE and LLC with foreign legal entities participation
LegalServicesPage.service6_title: Change of legal address/name of enterprises
LegalServicesPage.service7_title: Change in composition of founders (admission/withdrawal/sale of LLC shares)
LegalServicesPage.service14_title: Preparation and assistance filing liquidation documents
LegalServicesPage.service15_title: Preparation of resolutions/protocols on business matters
LegalServicesPage.service16_title: Preparation of HR documentation (employment contract, internal rules, salary regulations, staffing schedule)
LegalServicesPage.call_heading: Submit a request and we will contact you
LegalServicesPage.call_subheading: We will advise you and offer the optimal solution for your situation.
